title: NIST Names Shyam Sunder Associate Director for Laboratory Programs
snippet: GAITHERSBURG, Md., June 26, 2025 — The National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) announced that S. Shyam Sunder has been selected as its new associate director for laboratory programs (ADLP), effective June 1, 2025.
